name: One Hour Racing
description:
Welcome to One Hour Racing. The best non racing racing game, and objectively the best game to have ever existed. Basically, you play as a circle, and you can move around. However you accelerate very, very slowly. Also there's a very wacky timer that only works properly half the time, but that's not a bug, that's a feature.

Oh yeah I should probably mention that this game was made in one hour for a youtube video.

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys to move

Shift to break (A very useless feature)
